name: Ludum dare 36 - Keyboard commando
description:
Ludum dare 36 - Theme: Ancient Technology

In this ancient fps you can only use the keyboard, no mouse. Note the Mario Kart style world and the wolfenstein style pixel enemys.

Kill the invading force of 100 eye creature.

HAHAHA - Evil laugh!!!! No med-kits! HAHAHA!!!!

W - forward

S - back

A - turn right

D - turn left

Space - fire

Thanks for playing!
